table.mysql: CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.newsletter}` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `description` text NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `sender_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `sender_email` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `creation_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `sent_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `content_html` text NOT NULL, `content_plain` text NOT NULL, `header` text, `header_plain` text, `footer` text, `footer_plain` text, `comment` text, `template` varchar(100) default NULL, `image` int(11) default '0', `image_version` varchar(11) default '0', `lang` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ; alter table `{TABLE.newsletter}` add column `image` int(11) default '0' after `template`; alter table `{TABLE.newsletter}` add column `image_version` varchar(11) default '0' after `image`; alter table `{TABLE.newsletter}` add column `lang` varchar(100) NULL after `image_version`; ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.newsletter}` CHANGE `description` `description` text NOT NULL DEFAULT ""

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.newsletter_categories}` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `subscriber_count` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `creation_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
